Fashion has become a part of the daily air and it changes all the time. And beauty products have become synonymous to it. New trends and fads come in and out everyday occupying most of the shelf space of a woman’s dresser. Can you imagine a dresser without ravishing shades of lipstick and eyeshadows? Seems unrealistic, isn’t it? However, in the midst of the razzle-dazzle, have you ever thought about the safety protocols that are to be considered by the manufacturers?

GMCI is the leading manufacturer of cosmetic raw materials such as Kaolin, Mica and Talc. All of these materials occur naturally in nature. It is no news that the cosmetic products comprise of chemicals, dyes and several ingredients that might not always be the best suit for your skin. They might lead to some serious backlash. Along with keeping up with the latest industry trends, the manufacturers cannot turn a blind eye to the safety protocols. Most of the beauty products consist of metals like lead, arsenic and mercury which can put your body and life in jeopardy. The multi-color arrangements for the lips, eyes, cheeks etc. have specific dyes applied to them. These pigments have to undergo a series of quality check inspections to ensure the safety of the products.  The regulators such as the FDA approves the products on the basis of itssafety and cumulative exposure. In addition to this, these products have to also meet the international and national law requirements to further their case on being safe. GMCI’s compliance to all the regulations sets it apart from the crowd.

GMCI’s products are natural and organic. The organization is very articulate in its approach. Along with this, GMCI’s foundation is built on the foundation of sustainable development. It focuses on adding value by providing the customers with a personalized experience through its top-notch products. It’s wide array of beauty products are chemical-free as well as aesthetically pleasing.  As a dominant player and established organization in the production of dyes and pigments, GMCI ensures that it abides by the national and international laws. It emphasizes on synthesizing a better tomorrow by bringing in new innovations and creations. With significant alterations in its technology, it focuses on delivering best results.

GMCI’s most valuable assets are itscustomers and in no circumstance, it is willing to put their lives at stake. It’s a win-win for everyone.
